title: EDUCATE BHARAT
desc:
• Developed a course-centric website hosted on Render which offers course and educator details, registration, login and logout features.
  • Employed HTML, CSS, Handlebars, and Javascript for frontend development, while utilsing Node.js, Express.js for backend integration.
  • Incorporated MongoDB database with Mongoose library, facilitating registration, and leveraged MongoDB Atlas for storage on cloud.
  • Implemented security using Bycrypt with 10 salting rounds for hashing, email validation via Validators, and user authentication via JWT.

title: AUTOMATIC HOME AND STREET LIGHTING
desc:
• Designed an automated room and street lighting system based on human presence using Infrared sensor, and real-time person tracking.
  • Conducted compatibility tests, discussed pin configurations, analyzed battery life, and formulated risk assessment and mitigation plan.
  • Executed a simulation in Proteus, integrating it with Arduino IDE's coded solution, and successfully implemented hardware simulations.

title: HOMI JEHANGIR
desc:
• Built a full-fledged responsive website for HJB Hall which serves as an official hub for all the news and information about the hall.
  • Utilised HTML, CSS and Javascript web technologies for frontend development of the Gallery and header of the Homepage.
  • Added modal, animation, transition & hamburger features and created separate json file for representing structured gallery data.

title: SERVICE HUT
desc:
• Designed a business model to connect registered service providers with consumers through booking on our web application.
  • Segmented the market based on Geographic & Behavioural aspects and specified our target audience and target market.
  • Made a Competitive Landscape, listing our competitors in the market and mentioned Points of Parity and Points of Difference.
  • Analyse and estimated the Cost & Funding requirement and made a thorough Feasibility Analysis based on various factors.

title: DITCH THE SWITCH
desc:
• Designed a device which keeps track of people entering and leaving a room using two ultrasonic sensors, and turns off the appliances when no one in the room with some cooldown time.
  • Designed a device which keeps track of people entering and leaving a room using two ultrasonic sensors, and turns off the appliances when no one in the room with some cooldown time.
  • The Switching mechanism is controlled by the L293D Motor Drive IC Chip which sets pins to high and low.

title: DIGITAL THERMOMETER
desc:
• Designed a thermistor for measuring temperature with a certain range (0-150°C), resolution (0.1°C), and accuracy (±1°C).
  • Utilised NTC (Negative Temperature Coefficient) for low-cost temperature measurement using the Steinhart-Hart equation.

title: WRITING BOARD
desc:
• Made a whiteboard that follows the ball (circle detection) in the user's hand as a pen pointer to write in the air.
  • Converted the image to grayscale, applied a median blur to reduce noise, and drew the circle in the output image.
